1�Enter the battlefield?Enter.Decline.
1�Ugh. I knew it was a mistake to come here. My whiskers are beginning to wilt. Droop most unseemly.
1�Here. You'll need this if you want to proceed any further. Make some kind of headway.
1�Just please--don't lose it? Not that I don't have any spares, mind you...
1�You became a god of light, but I was overtaken by the Cloud of Darkness, doubtless owing to being an entity of pure darkness.
1�The cloud cares not for light and darkness, for neither can stop its eternal hunger.
1�Our separating into two entities was wholly without meaning.
1�The time has come for us to return to our world...and for me to return something of yours.
1�Altana and I await you.
1�Hold on--let's think about this a tad.
1�The future you saw was what would come to pass if you become a �[god/goddess] of light, no?
1�And those who joined you from the crystal...
1�Their spirits rejoined you once more even though they no longer existed in this world.
1�Even though you could call people back from the grave, it amounted to nothing in the end.
1�Was your becoming a �[god/goddess] futile?Yes, it was.No, it wasn't.
1�...I see. The Cloud of Darkness cannot be stopped by either the you-you or the other-you.
1�All life vanished from Vana'diel either way...
1�I think I understand now.
1�That's why the other you tried to prevent the Reckoning.
1�...I see. So if you become a �[god/goddess] of light, then you'll remain even after the rest have gone.
1�But Vana'diel will remain shattered...with only Iroha left.
1�Ah, and then there's the matter of the entity that was born of your darkness.
1�The cloud scrambled its brain and made it chase Iroha all the way back here.
1�Then there's one question left: where do we go from here?
1�Huh!? Go to Altana!? Have you gone mad? Totally taken leave of your senses?
1�Not that I don't know where she is, mind you...
1�But knowing where she is and knowing how to get there are two entirely different matters.
1�Not even I can find my way there.
1�But if your friend Selh'teus turned into a crystal, then he may be able to open a path for you. Guide you along the way.
1�You've got your plan--now put it into action!
1�Simply put, it's Promathia in his ascended form. Absolute and complete.
1�And this world...he's the only thing left.
1�Come now--it's up to you to make the first move. A little parley never hurt anyone!
1�Well, never again would I have thought to see one such as thee.
1�Answers thou seekest. Answers thou shalt have.
1�Darkness hath many forms. Apathy. Arrogance. Cowardice. Envy. Rage.
1�And, of course, death.
1�These are all powers over which I hold dominion. Yet the Cloud of Darkness is a wholly separate entity.
1�So if it's not your darkness, then...what, exactly?
1�The Cloud of Darkness is destined to envelop all...
1�We shall finally have release. Dost thou wish to meet Altana in this despite?
1���Release��? You wish to die?
1� , I think he might be cracked. Lost his marbles. But since he's asking for it, why not give him the old what-for?
1�How do you respond?Why do you want to die?Please, meet Altana...I didn't catch that.
1�Would that not be the only way to stop the cloud's approach? Through the death of a god?
1�No. Mine energy is best spent waiting for oblivion.
1�Gyaaaaaaaaah! !6 !
1�A day late...and a gil short.
1�N-not you again!
1�Ah, almighty god of darkness. What did you accomplish by absorbing  's tainted energies? Show me what you have done.
1�You know,  , despite my affection for you, you can be downright insufferable. A pain in the rump. Here you go.
1�Please, do your thing before my whiskers fall off.
1�I shudder to think of what might become of this world...
1�I travel......hear lots...Hear...stories... Can tell...if...
1�Do you want to hear a story?No, thank you.Let's hear one.Let's hear another!

1�What story would you like to be told?On second thought, maybe later.Death Cares Not.No Time Like the Future(pt.1).No Time Like the Future(pt.2).No Time Like the Future(pt.3).No Time Like the Future(pt.4).Sin(pt.1).Sin(pt.2).Sin(pt.3).Sin(pt.4).Vessel of Light.
1�Teleport to the Walk of Echoes?Yes.No.
